comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Jessie Woodrow Wilson, daughter of President Woodrow Wilson, married Francis Bowes Sayre in a White House ceremony, on November 25, 1913. In this photo, we see them embarking on their honeymoon voyage to Europe, aboard the North German Lloyd ship, "Vulcan," on December 1, 1913.

Bain/LOC photos of Sayre, with Ludwig Franck, the Vulcan's captain:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4818009787/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4586898878/in/set-72157603624867509/]
